_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: TrackMania NF / UF + XAseco
author: info@gamemania.org
description: TrackMania Nations Forever / United Forever Dedicated Server with XAseco.

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
# TRACKMANIA NF / UF Installation Script
#
## Vars
TMSERVER_DL="http://files2.trackmaniaforever.com/TrackmaniaServer_2011-02-21.zip"
XASECO_DL="https://fastdl.gamemania.org/xaseco1.16-php7.zip"
USER="container"
ENV USER=container HOME=/home/container
WORKDIR="/home/container"
# VOLUME /home/container
# mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}
# cd ${WORKDIR}
# Notwendige Pakete installieren
apk add --no-cache --update nano ca-certificates curl tar bash fontconfig php7 php7-fpm php7-gd php7-xml php7-curl php7-mysqli php7-zip php7-mbstring php7-xmlrpc php7-intl php7-common php7-cli php7-bz2 \
&& adduser -D -h /home/container container
# Server installieren
mkdir /home/container/tmnf-uf
wget ${TMSERVER_DL}
unzip TrackmaniaServer_2011-02-21.zip -d /home/container/tmnf-uf
cd /home/container/tmnf-uf/GameData/Tracks/MatchSettings/
rm /home/container/tmnf-uf/GameData/Tracks/MatchSettings/tracklist.txt
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Hoerli1337/pterodactyl-eggs/master/TMNF-UF/Config/tm/tracklist.txt
cd /home/container/tmnf-uf/GameData/Config/
rm /home/container/tmnf-uf/GameData/Config/dedicated_cfg.txt
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Hoerli1337/pterodactyl-eggs/master/TMNF-UF/Config/tm/dedicated_cfg.txt
#XAseco Installieren
mkdir /home/container/xaseco
wget ${XASECO_DL}
unzip xaseco1.16-php7.zip -d /home/container/xaseco
# Angepasste Startdatei für Xaseco
cd /home/container/xaseco
rm /home/container/xaseco/Aseco.sh
rm /home/container/xaseco/AsecoF.sh
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Hoerli1337/pterodactyl-eggs/master/TMNF-UF/Config/xaseco/Aseco.sh
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Hoerli1337/pterodactyl-eggs/master/TMNF-UF/Config/xaseco/AsecoF.sh
chmod 777 /home/container/xaseco/Aseco.sh
chmod 777 /home/container/xaseco/AsecoF.sh
# Berechtigungen
chown -R container.container /home/container/

variables.name: MASTERSERVER_KEY
variables.description: Last three characters of the player key

variables.name: SERVER_NAME
variables.description: Enter your server name here, which will be visible later in the game.

variables.name: MAX_PLAYERS
variables.description:
Specify the maximum number of slots here. A maximum of 255 slots is possible. Note the specifications of Nadeo for ladder servers.
https://player.trackmania.com/main.php?view=ladder-servers

variables.name: SUPERADMIN_PWD
variables.description: SuperAdmin password. Change it to make your server secure!

variables.name: ADMIN_PWD
variables.description: Admin password. Change it to make your server secure!
